data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gagné, Raymond J., Etienne, Jean (2015): Three new genera and three new species of Lasiopteridi (Diptera: Cecidomyiidae) on Rubiaceae from Guadeloupe, French West Indies, and a key to genera of Neotropical Lasiopteridi unplaced to tribe. Zootaxa 4028 (4): 511-526, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.4.3
